programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: After the death of their father and mother, four siblings reunite to come to terms with the tragedy. They decide to participate in a hunting challenge which will determine their inheritance.

programme.title: Aspromonte: Land Of The Forgotten
programme.desc: In 1959 in Africo, Aspromonte, a woman dies in childbirth because the lack of roads prevented the doctor from reaching in time. The tragedy unites the villagers and Giulia, a new teacher, to build a road. But Giulia must contend with local mafia Don Totó.

programme.title: Summer Rebels
programme.desc: Young Jonas wants to visit his cool grandpa in Slovakia for a summer of fun, but his mom has other plans. Undeterred, Jonas takes off on an adventure of his own in this luminous and light-hearted tale of rebellion, friendship, catastrophe and redemption.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Embassy Attack
programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young protegé, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?

programme.title: Margherita Hack - The Lady Of The Stars
programme.desc: The intimate and emotional biography of Italian astrophysicist Margherita Hack, from an independent and curious child to the first female director of the Trieste Astronomical Observatory.

programme.title: SAF
programme.desc: Desperate, Kamil takes a low wage job in Istanbul's urbanization project. In so doing, he displaces a Syrian refugee and partakes in his neighborhood’s destruction, while also needing to pay for the required permits. One day, Kamil suddenly disappears.

programme.title: Lost Transport
programme.desc: Spring 1945. A train deporting hundreds of Jewish prisoners gets stranded near a small German village occupied by the Red Army. A chance encounter between German girl Winnie, Dutch Jew Simone and Russian Vera leads to an unexpected friendship.

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: After the death of their father and mother, four siblings reunite to come to terms with the tragedy. They decide to participate in a hunting challenge which will determine their inheritance.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.

programme.title: Sleepless Night
programme.desc: A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld finds his secret life exposed when he and his partner are caught stealing cocaine from a powerful drug dealer, a move that puts his son's life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Mammal
programme.desc: Margaret (Rachel Griffiths), a silently grieving divorcee forms an intense bond with Joe (Barry Keoghan), a homeless youth. Their oedipal relationship is threatened by the wrath of Margaret’s ex-husband and Joe’s involvement with a gang of violent youths.

programme.title: Ka Benjie
programme.desc: The quiet life of the dreamer Ka Benjie was shattered when he heard of the enrollment in the other village.

programme.title: A Tale of Samurai Cooking - A True Love Story
programme.desc: Great cook Haru has married into the legendary “Kitchen Samurai” family. But her husband who is the successor of the Funaki family cannot cook at all. Haru makes a vow to make him a superb samurai chef and starts teaching her new husband how to cook.

programme.title: Tokyo Fianc ée
programme.desc: A charming and tender tale of young love and cultural discovery. Amélie, a Japanophile young Belgian woman in Tokyo falls into a whirlwind romance with Rinri, a Francophile Japanese student.

programme.title: Hoarders S12 - EP 17
programme.desc: A reality-TV show that features compulsive hoarders--people who are addicted to filling their homes with objects--and how that spills out into their lives.

Celebrated food expert Adam Richman crisscrosses the country taking a deep dive into how food products are made, detailing both the process of the craft and the inspiration behind the ideas.

programme.desc: The best amateur bakers from across Canada compete in a series of themed culinary challenges that celebrate their diversity. Ten of the country's most passionate bakers go head-to-head in a series of tasks that celebrate their diverse backgrounds, families and communities. In each episode they'll face three nail-biting rounds, in a warm-spirited competition that celebrates personal achievement and the joy of baking.

programme.title: SAF
programme.desc: Desperate, Kamil takes a low wage job in Istanbul's urbanization project. In so doing, he displaces a Syrian refugee and partakes in his neighborhood’s destruction, while also needing to pay for the required permits. One day, Kamil suddenly disappears.

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.

programme.title: Sleepless Night
programme.desc: A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld finds his secret life exposed when he and his partner are caught stealing cocaine from a powerful drug dealer, a move that puts his son's life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Girl Gone Missing
programme.desc: Public Prosecutor Mehringer has been dealt a tough hand in his case against the Ukrainian arms trafficker Artem Lazarev: his most important witness is supposed to die. Investigator Sarah Kohr helps to stage the witness’ death, but all is not as they seem.

programme.title: Mammal
programme.desc: Margaret (Rachel Griffiths), a silently grieving divorcee forms an intense bond with Joe (Barry Keoghan), a homeless youth. Their oedipal relationship is threatened by the wrath of Margaret’s ex-husband and Joe’s involvement with a gang of violent youths.

programme.title: Penny Bank
programme.desc: Middle aged Orhan is struggling with every aspect of his life: he has to take care of his comatose mother, he is in debt, he cannot fulfill his role as a father, and he has to juggle multiple jobs. Eventually, he has to make an impossible decision…

programme.title: Ka Benjie
programme.desc: The quiet life of the dreamer Ka Benjie was shattered when he heard of the enrollment in the other village.

programme.title: Tokyo Fianc ée
programme.desc: A charming and tender tale of young love and cultural discovery. Amélie, a Japanophile young Belgian woman in Tokyo falls into a whirlwind romance with Rinri, a Francophile Japanese student.

programme.title: Murders in Toulouse
programme.desc: Several corpses are found scattered across Toulouse, with evidence strangely linked to a particular song’s lyrics. Captain Keller, a veteran inspector ravaged by an illness, teams up with a young officer, who has secrets of her own, to solve the case.

programme.title: A Tale of Samurai Cooking - A True Love Story
programme.desc: Great cook Haru has married into the legendary “Kitchen Samurai” family. But her husband who is the successor of the Funaki family cannot cook at all. Haru makes a vow to make him a superb samurai chef and starts teaching her new husband how to cook.

programme.title: To My Beloved
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.

programme.title: Stormskerry Maja
programme.desc: At 17, Maja marries humble fisherman Janne and starts a family on the remote island of Stormskerry, where survival is a constant challenge. Amidst the hardships, Maja awakens to her potential, finding resilience and a love that transcends life and death.

programme.title: Torch
programme.desc: In a war zone, two sisters, stuck in a basement while waiting for their father, attempt to distract themselves from the desperation of their situation by playing games and recounting old stories.

programme.title: East Frisian: Atonement
programme.desc: Detective Ann Kathrin Klaasen grapples with her father's unsolved murder, which still haunts her after fifteen years. After much urging from her concerned partner Frank Wellerto to seek help, she heads to a doctor, where she notices a clue in the office.
